name: Parkour Harvest (LD52)
description:
Try to get to the other side of the parkour to harvest a ton of carrots :D. To end the game. either press the exit button on the main menu or the end screen.

P.S. If you don't want to play the game, and try pressing ESC key to exit the game, it won't work. So you have to go into the start menu and close the window manually there.
